Comments_List: I started developing my own research to a greater degree in this semester than last semester. As a research seminar I think it was very effective. I learned from my peers as well, from watching them present their own research and field questions about their methods, inquiries, and so on.
I thought the organization (talking for a few minutes before some sessions to get everyone on the same page about who would present when) was well done.

Yes. We had an undergraduate in this seminar and it was great to have that intersection between graduate and undergrad. 
This is such a good environment to pursue research and get feedback from peers I would like to pinpoint some formal aspects that I can later use in other environments to bring them up to a good speed.
